shortdesc.ph: Sets the allowlist for audio stream subscription.
Sets the audio stream subscription allowlist.

p.codeblock: virtual int setSubscribeAudioAllowlist(uid_t* uidList, int uidNumber) = 0;

ul.li: You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
The allowlist is not affected by , , or the autoSubscribeAudio setting in .
Once the allowlist is set, it remains effective even if you leave and rejoin the channel.
If a user is included in both the allowlist and blocklist, only the blocklist takes effect.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
The allowlist is not affected by , , or the autoSubscribeAudio setting in .
Once the allowlist is set, it remains effective even if you leave and rejoin the channel.
If a user is added to both the allowlist and blocklist, only the blocklist takes effect.

plentry.pd: The list of user IDs whose audio streams you want to subscribe to. To remove a user from the allowlist, call again with a new list that only includes the user IDs you still want to subscribe to.
The number of user IDs in the list.

List of user IDs whose audio streams you want to subscribe to. When you call this method, only audio streams from users in this list are subscribed to. If you want to remove a user from the allowlist, call again with a new list that only includes the user IDs you still want to subscribe to.
